Dialogue.Page: Hey, hatchling! Good to see you're finally awake.
It looks to me like you're confused about what's going on. A lot happened while you were asleep!
Try <color=orange>talking to the others down on the surface</color>. Maybe that will help you catch up on what happened.
See that large clump of trees at the bottom of the planet? That's where they set up camp.
Speak to <color=orange>Rutile</color>, they'll know what to do.
